name: Detective City
description:
Detective City is an award-winning Global Game Jam 2015 submission from fake game development studio Plus Ultra. This download contains the full polished local html version of the game, as well as the Twine 1.4.2 source files used to create it.

The game is now playable in-browser at plusultra.ninja.

You are free to cannibalize this game's javascript and twine source code for whatever purposes you desire. If you have any questions about how it works, email us at plusultragames@gmail.com.

(You may have seen this listed elsewhere on Itch.io under a different developer; this page is its new home.)

Detective City uses extensive randomization to create a new adventure every time you play.
